comments.en:
Japanese version of the Epson Stylus Photo 785.

As the Stylus Photo 780, but with a PCMCIA Type II slot to read memory cards of digital cameras via an appropriate PCMCIA adapter, so one can print photos without PC. Photo download work with kernel 2.4.21 or later. The memory card can be simply mounted as a USB-mass-storage device then.

6-color CMYKcm printing.

Roll paper feeder, USB only.
